analysis.description:
AntarctiCoin.startDate (/unique_chucks/41/0xd8fa24717834bb1e79440cef2e40a3203bacd52e.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/41/0xd8fa24717834bb1e79440cef2e40a3203bacd52e.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/41/0xd8fa24717834bb1e79440cef2e40a3203bacd52e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/41/0xd8fa24717834bb1e79440cef2e40a3203bacd52e.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/41/0xd8fa24717834bb1e79440cef2e40a3203bacd52e.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
